patterns: How to apply timesheet using mobile
responses:
You can fill the timesheet through mobile or pc.

Path for applying though pc :
Ultimatix--> Menu--> Applications--> Employee Services--> Employee Self Services--> Timesheet entry.

For applying through mobile you can directly have timesheet app where it is available in UXApps

Path for applying leave :
Ultimatix--> Menu--> Applications--> Employee Services--> Employee Self Services--> Global ESS--> Leave

patterns: To whom should I contact for leave

responses: Before Applying any kind of leave, you should inform Anand or Rohan. They will help you for applying leaves or any other needs.

patterns: what is the major tool that dlp team is working on
which tool is dlp team using
what is tool that dlp team is using
tell me anything about jira tool
what is jira tool used for
responses:
--> Jira Software is an agile project management tool that supports any agile methodology, be it scrum, kanban, or your own unique flavor. From agile boards, backlogs, roadmaps, reports, to integrations and add-ons you can plan, track, and manage all your agile software development projects from a single tool.

--> From agile boards, backlogs, roadmaps, reports, to integrations and add-ons you can plan, track, and manage all your agile software development projects from a single tool.

--> Jira Software is part of a family of products designed to help teams of all types manage work. Originally, Jira was designed as a bug and issue tracker. But today, Jira has evolved into a powerful work management tool for all kinds of use cases, from requirements and test case management to agile software development.

patterns: In which domain dlp team is working on
In which field dlp team is working on
In which category dlp team is working on
tell me anything about cyber security
what is cyber security used for
responses:
--> Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.

--> These cyberattacks are usually aimed at accessing, changing, or destroying sensitive information; extorting money from users; or interrupting normal business processes.

--> With an increasing number of users, devices and programs in the modern enterprise, combined with the increased deluge of data -- much of which is sensitive or confidential -- the importance of cybersecurity continues to grow. The growing volume and sophistication of cyber attackers and attack techniques compound the problem even further.
